name: Trembling Gratitude
description:
Making a play on words with "SHIVER", the name of this work seeks to communicate my total gratitude and homage to you.

Its concept internalizes us with the style, speed and dimensions that the 6 works were going to have previously. On the other hand, I have chosen to give it a cheap price so that those who could not buy pieces for 1XTZ, can buy one now :)

I decided to mint 10 editions for every work (6), and to give them a 50% cheaper price than the original pieces from the collection. 

This special edition is made to give a closure to this SHIVER collection. Hoping to resume this style (someday) with new ideas!

Thank you very much for all your support. I will have to think of new ways to surprise you! Love You!

MUCHAS GRACIAS!!


Maturín, Venezuela. August 10th, 2021.
